overview:
Brandon joined Become in October 2008. In his role, Brandon is responsible for the overall direction and management of Become.comâ€™s operations. He has over 15 years of experience in the online industry, which includes NexTag, where he served as vice president for product shopping. While at NexTag, Brandonâ€™s responsibilities included product shopping operations, product management and the companyâ€™s international expansion.

Prior to joining Become.com, Brandon served as senior vice president of business development at FusionOne, a global provider of mobile technology, where he oversaw all company business development, sales, and product management functions. Previously, Brandon was senior vice president of business operations at Andale and has held other senior management positions at Andale, IPG and BizLink International Group. Brandon holds a BA degree from the University of Virginia.
